articles.title: Body parts found in landing gear of flight from Kabul, officials say - TODAYonline
articles.description: WASHINGTON — The Air Force acknowledged on Tuesday (Aug 17) that human body parts were found in the wheel well of an American military C-17 cargo plane that took flight amid chaos at Hamid Karzai International Airport in Afghanistan’s capital, Kabul.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: Maki Kaji, the 'godfather of Sudoku,' dies at 69 - CNN
articles.description: Kaji reworked an American puzzle into Sudoku. He didn't own the trademark to international versions of the puzzle but loved to share his simple Sudoku with players of all ages and skill levels.
